name: Slo's Home
description:
Forty is an unknown content creator who made some videos criticizing the popular video game content creator Slo. During a Slo live show, after Forty subscribed to his channel, he was scolded and humiliated live, with the entire Slo community turning against him. Now Forty seeks revenge by trying to get all the information possible to unmask the real Slo, paying him back in kind.

Slo's Home is a game that combines the control of an action game with the control of a point'n click adventure. Explore content creator Slo's house without being discovered and get his secret files. Complete multiple puzzles using both skill and intelligence in equal measure. You will need to examine his house from top to bottom to find the information you need. Good luck genius!
